About Us

üëÅÔ∏è

VISION

At Cherry+ Network, we aspire to be the leading platform that bridges the gap between academic learning and professional competence and foster their skills to succeed in professional domains. We aim to establish ourselves as the ultimate catalyst for professional growth, connecting students with industry experts, providing them with opportunities to expand their professional networks and improve their career prospects.

üöÄ

MISSION

Our mission is to serve as the bridge between students and their success by empowering our community to thrive professional opportunities through innovative programs and foster networking for career advancement. We create their path to opportunity by offering masterclasses, internship programs, and industry connections, membership programs, and industry collaborations with which we can achieve our mission by bridging the gap between academic learning and professional growth.

WHAT ARE WE?

"The Coolest Club on Campus" - that is the tagline that we go around with. The goal in sight is like two students together by diverse backgrounds, learning opportunities, and life experiences at all the future, at the same.
